question_stem_html:
Question 5

Refer to the picture below taken from Topic 9 lecture notes page 65 on the graph for the top 5 rules with the highest Lift within the Groceries data set:


Which rule has the highest Support?
A
{ ham, processed cheese} -> { white bread }
B
{ Instant food products, soda } -> { hamburger meat }
C
{ hamburger meat, whipped/sour cream, yogurt ) -> { butter }
D
{ white bread, other vegetables, tropical fruit, yogurt } -> { butter }

choices.text: { Instant food products, soda } -> { hamburger meat }
choices.text_html: { Instant food products, soda } -> { hamburger meat }

choices.text: { hamburger meat, whipped/sour cream, yogurt ) -> { butter }
choices.text_html: { hamburger meat, whipped/sour cream, yogurt ) -> { butter }

choices.text: { white bread, other vegetables, tropical fruit, yogurt } -> { butter }
choices.text_html: { white bread, other vegetables, tropical fruit, yogurt } -> { butter }
